title: Andrews calls for social media ban for under-13s
snippet: Dublin People 26 Nov 2025 · Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews · Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews has said that no one under the age of 13 should be allowed to access social media.

title: Social media 'geopolitical battleground', says Andrews
snippet: Updated / Sunday, 14 Dec 2025 17:11 · Irish MEP Barry Andrews said the quality of X has 'drastically declined' Eithne Dodd · By Eithne Dodd · Irish MEP Barry Andrews has warned that social media has "become a geopolitical battleground".

title: Ireland and Europe must prepare for post-war Ukraine, says Andrews
snippet: Dublin People 02 Dec 2025 · Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews strongly welcomed the visit of President Zelensky to Dublin and stated that Ireland should now prepare for the post-war period.

title: Barry Andrews: At the front, it's clear Ireland must continue to support Ukraine
snippet: If cuts to Ukrainian supports here are necessary, due to the accommodation crisis in Ireland, then we should make up that support in other ways, writes MEP Barry Andrews · Soldiers practise military skills on a training ground near Kharkiv, Ukraine, in August. Photo: Anatolii Lysianskyi/Ukraine's 127th Separate Brigade via AP · Wed, 19 Nov, 2025 - 00:58 ·

title: Andrews welcomes €3 levy on fast fashion packages
snippet: Dublin People 12 Dec 2025 · Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews · Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews has welcomed an EU decision to introduce a €3 customs duty per item on cheap e-commerce parcels, starting in July 2026.
